events.message: I have recently been involved in a car accident and need to file a claim for the damages sustained to my vehicle. The collision occurred at an intersection.
The claim has been reviewed and appropriately categorized under auto accident for further processing and follow-up actions.
An agent has been assigned to your case to assist with managing your auto accident claim and to provide updates on the progress.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding the vehicle collision, and we are committed to handling it promptly and efficiently.
To continue processing your claim, please submit the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates from a licensed garage.
All required documents including the police report and repair bills have been submitted successfully to support the auto accident claim.
The claims investigation team has begun assessing the details and verifying the information related to your car accident submission.
The investigation into your vehicle collision claim has been completed with all facts verified and validated for settlement consideration.
Based on the investigation, we propose a settlement amount to cover your repair costs and other damages related to the car accident.
You have provided feedback expressing satisfaction with the timely response and the fairness of the proposed settlement for your vehicle.
Your claim for the auto accident has been officially approved. We are processing the financial settlement as per the agreed terms.
The payment for your approved claim has been issued and should reflect in your designated account within the next few business days.
Your auto accident claim case has been closed following successful settlement payment and completion of all related formalities.
The vehicle accident claim file has been archived in our system for future reference and record-keeping purposes.
